text: Liu Huan (ï¼Œborn August 26, 1963) is a Chinese singer. In 1990, Liu sang the official theme song Asian Mighty Winds () with Wei Wei at the 1990 Asian Games in Beijing. On 8 August 2008, Liu sang the official theme song You and Me with British singer Sarah Brightman at the 2008 Summer Olympics opening ceremony in Beijing. title: Liu Huan
